oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Careless Love - Minnie Pearl performance - 1951-10-13 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of excerpts from a non-opry radio program from October 13, 1951. Featuring Cousin Louis Buck (announcer), and a performance of Careless Love, as performed by Minnie Pearl and "sister".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Minnie Pearl talks -- Minnie Pearl introduces "sister" -- Careless Love (Minnie Pearl and "sister") (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Document listing the date and content [handwritten] stored with transcription documents; Box 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996;
